citations.desc: Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC).
citations.narrative:
Two IACUC members who are not affiliated with the institution have not participated in IACUC meetings, program review,
or facility inspections, for the entire 2025 calendar year. The IACUC chair has recommended one candidate, but the Chief
Executive Officer has not yet appointed an unaffiliated IACUC member. The unaffiliated member represents the general
community interest in the proper care and treatment of animals used in research. If this member is not present it could
have negative effects on animal welfare. All members of the IACUC committee, including the unaffiliated member, shall
be appointed by the Chief Executive Officer of the research facility. To be corrected by February 2, 2026.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.
n

narrative:
2.31(b)(1) 
   
Institutional Animal Care and Use Committee (IACUC). 
Two IACUC members who are not affiliated with the institution have not participated in IACUC meetings, program review, 
or facility inspections, for the entire 2025 calendar year. The IACUC chair has recommended one candidate, but the Chief 
Executive Officer has not yet appointed an unaffiliated IACUC member. The unaffiliated member represents the general 
community interest in the proper care and treatment of animals used in research. If this member is not present it could 
have negative effects on animal welfare. All members of the IACUC committee, including the unaffiliated member, shall 
be appointed by the Chief Executive Officer of the research facility. To be corrected by February 2, 2026. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the attending veterinarian.
